overview: When these pigs start playing, it's all or nothing and they don't quit easy. They play hard, they play raw, they play deep and they play long; clocking in at over 3.5 hours of fucking and fisting. Pure smut, helmed by Matthias von Fistenberg, this film documents a sizzling play session between these scorching hot men, without interruption or boring acting. Real, raw and pushing the limits of your deviant imagination as Dark Alley does best.
title: Pigs Don't Stop
